resources.string: All rights reserved. The use of this app is subject to its terms and conditions of use.
Welcome to the CirclePix Mobile App!

Designed to integrate seamlessly with your CirclePix account, this app transforms your mobile device, giving it the power to help enhance your real estate marketing! Get started by using your CirclePix account credentials to sign in below.
Use this form if you have forgotten your username or password. Enter your email address and an email will be sent containing your username and a new password.
Create a Presentation by clicking the + button.

This screen displays a list of your active property listings. Create a new listing by click the "+" symbol. To edit, upload images or video to one of your listings, select a property below, and choose to add an existing video, or record a new video.
Upload images to your virtual tour. Please make sure your images are in jpeg format (.jpg extension), have a resolution of at least 1024 x 768, and are no larger than 2 MB in size.
**NOTE: The first image will be your primary image.
Tap on an image to delete it.
If you have a YouTube Video you would like to display on your property site, please enter the YouTube Id or URL below:
add your youtube id or url here...

Contacts permission is needed for doing some magic
Audio recording will not be available until you accept the permission request
This permission is needed for doing some fancy stuff so please, allow it!
Camera permission is needed to show the camera preview.
Contacts permissions are needed to demonstrate access to the contacts database.

Start developing trust with potential buyers early on by incorporating a personal message with your marketing. Record a biography video on your mobile device, and use this app to instantly upload it to your agent profile.

Once your video has been uploaded, it will be displayed on the Real Estate Agent Biography page on the property guide of very listing you represent! Here is an example of the Real Estate Agent Biography page as it appears in the property guide. This is a great opportunity for potential buyers to learn about your experience, specialty, and background. Tell why you became a real estate agent, and express your mission statement. Have some fun with your biography video and let your personality shine!
Please enter the required information and click the Upload Video button.
You can choose to upload video to your listing or share your tour and youtube link.
Would you like to enter a YouTube URL, record a new video or select from the existing videos?
Hassle-free Real Estate Marketing is here.
Simplify your real estate marketing and increase your productivity.
Circlepix has you covered - no matter your level of marketing expertise or time commitment. Whether you\'re new to the industry or a seasoned veteran, Circlepix has tools made just for you!
Consider us your real estate marketing arm - flexed
At Circlepix, our goal is to build simple, smart solutions that make real estate marketing easy.!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
*When checked, this listing will be posted to your CirclePix connected social media sites like Twitter, Facebook, Blogger, LinkedIn and Youtube
**When checked, this listing will be posted to your CirclePix connected external real estate sites like your MLS if set up
Add bullet point information to your tour. Each field you enter will add a bulleted list item to the brochure. Examples: outdoor pool vaulted ceilings marble fireplace

We want every real estate agent to have access to the best photography services, the latest marketing technology, and the strongest social media tools available. And we make it easy — to understand, to use and use again.
It’s our commitment. It’s your opportunity.

Customize the general look and feel of your presentation by editing the settings below. You can show or exclude company and agent information. Note: Company and agent information is stored with CirclePix. To edit this information login to your CirclePix account and select "edit agent profile".

This page displays a list of existing presentations. Create a new presentation by clicking "+" symbol at the bottom right of this page. Share, edit and delete a presentation by tapping the presentation on the list.

Customize your presentation to include only the aspects of the CirclePix marketing suite you want to use to market and sell your listings. Name your presentation and click on the other four icons to personalize the presentation.
You can upload a photo or choose the music and narration options in Presentation Settings.
Below are the tools available in the CirclePix marketing suite. If there is a feature you don\'t use, simply turn off that option and it will be skipped in the presentation.
CirclePix provides media exposure on portals, websites and social media platforms. If there is a platform you don\'t use, simply turn off that option and it will be skipped in the presentation.

The CirclePix marketing suite can be used to communicate to buyers and sellers effectively. If there is a communication channel you don\'t plan on using, simply turn off that option and it will be skipped in the presentation.
These are the presentation settings. They control narration, music, theme, etc. Defaults have been applied from the application settings.
These settings control aspects of the presentation related to the Star Marketing program. Defaults have been applied but you can change them.
These are your default settings. Every new presentation created will adopt these settings.
This is where you can change your agent name
To change Co-Listing Agent visit circlepix.com
This is where you can change the background music that will play in the background of your presentation.
Recorded narration is available in either a male or female voice. Choose one below.
Selecting "None" will put the presentation into manual mode
Choose whether you will hire a professional photographer or photograph this listing yourself.
Take an image of the desired listing to help identify your presentation.

To change your CirclePix login password, enter the new password and verify it below. All passwords must be at least four characters long.
Your current username for CirclePix is
You may change the username below. Note that usernames must be more than four characters long.
Here you may edit the account information that will show up on your virtual tours.
If you want these changes to be reflected on all of your listing videos, please check the box below before clicking the \'Save\' button.
If you have a YouTube Video you would like displayed on your biography page on the Presentation Tour, please enter the YouTube Id below.

Start developing trust with potential buyers early on by incorporating a personal message with your marketing. Record a biography video on your mobile device, and use this app to instantly upload it to your agent profile.
If you have personal social media links you would like to be diplayed on your propery sites, please enter them below.

Here you can see a preview of your agent picture if you have one uploaded. To upload a new picture click the Upload icon, select to capture photo using Camera or Gallery to locate the picture on your device, select it, and click \"Save\". To remove your current picture, click the Delete icon.

Here you can see a preview of your company/personal logo if you have one uploaded. To upload a new logo click the Upload icon , select to capture photo using Camera or Gallery to locate the picture on your device, select it, and click \"Save\". You may also use one of our many existing logos by selecting that logo from the \"Existing Company Logo\" box and clicking Save. To remove your current logo, click the Delete icon.
You haven\'t uploaded a company/personal logo.
You haven\'t uploaded an agent picture.
There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
